channel.title: What do do with the din/power section? Can it be repurposed?
channel.description:
Hi guys,
I'm working on a project that didn't require the din connectors so I cut the section off. Has anyone reused that section in its entirety? Any ideas on what to do with it?
Thanks
B

item.title: What do do with the din/power section? Can it be repurposed?

that's great! I havent kept up on the news
cheers

item.title: What do do with the din/power section? Can it be repurposed?

use it with one of the new mini axoloti boards (not official)

i guess you can also use them with an arduino or similar.
